name: who's calling
description:
Important: If you are playing web version maximalize the game.

People want to call other people. But how it works? I don't know, that's you'r job.

Connect pepoples calls, just how it worked before those computers.

You don't like graphics? Me either but I done best I could and hope you had some fun playing my game.

Main theme made in beepbox - https://www.beepbox.co/

Sfx licence - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Game Made by sledzik089 for GMTK Game Jam 2021
